DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Binding Protein ( Gc ) Allele Variation Effects Response Vitamin D Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: We suspect wide range response effect factor variation Vitamin D bind protein ( major transporter Vitamin D metabolites ) . Gc , also know Vitamin D bind protein ( DBP ) , group specific component , Gc globulin , 52-58 kDa multifunctional plasma protein , synthesize liver . The gene encode Gc locate chromosome 4 , three common co-dominant allele give rise three phenotype ( Gc1s , Gc1f , Gc2 ) . Gc bind actin , recruit neutrophil leukocyte convert macrophage- osteoclast- activating factor . It also major transporter Vitamin D ' metabolite . Lauridsen et al . show Gc phenotype correlate 25 ( OH ) D level group postmenopausal woman . This study propose Gc phenotype account variation response 25 ( OH ) D level treatment oral Vitamin D .
